item.title: Git Branching made easy
item.description: Intro Git isn’t as complex as it seems; once you get the hang of it. But it can be daunting, I admit to that. So let me explain the basics to you, so you too can jump in and use Git in a team. First rule of Git-club is: Never work on main; always use a branch to work on features and issues. Why this matters? Because main is your holy grail, your production.
